languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, я готов поклясться жизнью и душой, храни ее свет Императора, что все это — не домыслы. Мы жили при Вьятт долгие десятилетия, и год за годом все становилось хуже и хуже... люди не могут больше терпеть того кошмара, что таится за стенами этой усадьбы!"

traits.locale_text: "Ваше Благородие, я готов поклясться жизнью и душой, храни ее свет Императора, что все это — не домыслы. Мы жили при Вьятт долгие десятилетия, и год за годом все становилось хуже и хуже... люди не могут больше терпеть того кошмара, что таится за стенами этой усадьбы!" {n}Старый слуга надрывно закашливается.{/n}

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm prepared to swear on my life and soul, may the light of the Emperor preserve it, that it is not conjecture. We have been living under Vyatt's rule for decades now, and things have gotten worse and worse with every passing year... The people can no longer tolerate the nightmare that lurks within the walls of this estate!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, я готов поклясться жизнью и душой, храни ее свет Императора, что все это — не домыслы. Мы жили при Вьятт долгие десятилетия, и год за годом все становилось хуже и хуже... люди не могут больше терпеть того кошмара, что таится за стенами этой усадьбы!"

We have been living under Vyatt's rule for decades now, and things have gotten worse and worse with every passing year... We have been living under Vyatt's rule for decades now, and things have gotten worse and worse with every passing year... The people can no longer tolerate the nightmare that lurks within the walls of this estate!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm prepared to swear on my life and soul, may the light of the Emperor preserve it, that it is not conjecture. We have been living under Vyatt's rule for decades now, and things have gotten worse and worse with every passing year... The people can no longer tolerate the nightmare that lurks within the walls of this estate!"

languages.text: 「陛下、この命と魂に誓う覚悟です。皇帝の光が明らかにしてくださるでしょう、憶測ではないと。この数年間をビャットの支配下で生きてきたのです、しかし状況は年々悪化の一途をたどるばかり…。住民はもう、この屋敷の塀の中でうごめく悪夢に耐えられないのです！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm prepared to swear on my life and soul, may the light of the Emperor preserve it, that it is not conjecture. We have been living under Vyatt's rule for decades now, and things have gotten worse and worse with every passing year... The people can no longer tolerate the nightmare that lurks within the walls of this estate!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、この命と魂に誓う覚悟です。皇帝の光が明らかにしてくださるでしょう、憶測ではないと。この数年間をビャットの支配下で生きてきたのです、しかし状況は年々悪化の一途をたどるばかり…。住民はもう、この屋敷の塀の中でうごめく悪夢に耐えられないのです！」

languages.text: “大人，愿帝皇保佑！我愿意用我的生命和灵魂起誓，这些绝对不是谣言。我们在维亚特的统治之下已经生活了几十年，情况一年比一年糟糕……人们再也受不了藏在这个庄园里的怪物了！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm prepared to swear on my life and soul, may the light of the Emperor preserve it, that it is not conjecture. We have been living under Vyatt's rule for decades now, and things have gotten worse and worse with every passing year... The people can no longer tolerate the nightmare that lurks within the walls of this estate!"

traits.locale_text: “大人，愿帝皇保佑！我愿意用我的生命和灵魂起誓，这些绝对不是谣言。我们在维亚特的统治之下已经生活了几十年，情况一年比一年糟糕……人们再也受不了藏在这个庄园里的怪物了！”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, puedo jurar por mi vida y mi alma, que la luz del Emperador la preserve, que esto no es una conjetura. Llevamos décadas viviendo bajo el mandato de Vyatt, y las cosas no han dejado de empeorar a cada año que pasa... ¡El pueblo ya no puede tolerar las pesadillas que acechan tras los muros de esta mansión!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm prepared to swear on my life and soul, may the light of the Emperor preserve it, that it is not conjecture. We have been living under Vyatt's rule for decades now, and things have gotten worse and worse with every passing year... The people can no longer tolerate the nightmare that lurks within the walls of this estate!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, puedo jurar por mi vida y mi alma, que la luz del Emperador la preserve, que esto no es una conjetura. Llevamos décadas viviendo bajo el mandato de Vyatt, y las cosas no han dejado de empeorar a cada año que pasa... ¡El pueblo ya no puede tolerar las pesadillas que acechan tras los muros de esta mansión!».

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich schwöre bei meinem Leben und meiner Seele, das Licht des Imperators möge sie bewahren, dass das keine Hypothesen sind. Wir leben schon seit Jahrzehnten unter Vyatts Herrschaft, und mit jedem Jahr ist es schlimmer geworden ... Die Menschen können den Albtraum nicht länger ertragen, der in den Mauern dieses Anwesens lauert!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm prepared to swear on my life and soul, may the light of the Emperor preserve it, that it is not conjecture. We have been living under Vyatt's rule for decades now, and things have gotten worse and worse with every passing year... The people can no longer tolerate the nightmare that lurks within the walls of this estate!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich schwöre bei meinem Leben und meiner Seele, das Licht des Imperators möge sie bewahren, dass das keine Hypothesen sind. Wir leben schon seit Jahrzehnten unter Vyatts Herrschaft, und mit jedem Jahr ist es schlimmer geworden ... Die Menschen können den Albtraum nicht länger ertragen, der in den Mauern dieses Anwesens lauert!"

languages.text: « Ce ne sont pas des rumeurs, Votre Seigneurie ; je suis prêt à le jurer sur ma vie, que la lumière de l'Empereur la préserve. Cela fait des décennies que nous vivons sous la férule de Vyatt et chaque année, la situation empire. Les gens ne peuvent plus tolérer ce qui se trame derrière les murs de ce domaine ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm prepared to swear on my life and soul, may the light of the Emperor preserve it, that it is not conjecture. We have been living under Vyatt's rule for decades now, and things have gotten worse and worse with every passing year... The people can no longer tolerate the nightmare that lurks within the walls of this estate!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce ne sont pas des rumeurs, Votre Seigneurie ; je suis prêt à le jurer sur ma vie, que la lumière de l'Empereur la préserve. Cela fait des décennies que nous vivons sous la férule de Vyatt et chaque année, la situation empire. Les gens ne peuvent plus tolérer ce qui se trame derrière les murs de ce domaine ! »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, yaşamım ve ruhum üzerine yemin etmeye hazırım. İmparator'un ışığı ebedî olsun ki bunlar varsayım değil. On yıllardır Vyatt'ın hükmünde yaşıyoruz ve her şey, her geçen yıl daha da kötüye gidiyor. İnsanlar bu konağın duvarlarının içinde kol gezen kâbusa tahammül edemiyor artık!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm prepared to swear on my life and soul, may the light of the Emperor preserve it, that it is not conjecture. We have been living under Vyatt's rule for decades now, and things have gotten worse and worse with every passing year... The people can no longer tolerate the nightmare that lurks within the walls of this estate!"
